title: Wargame: European Escalation - Update 1 - RELOADED
description:
View the changelog here:


First update to Wargame: European Escalation just released by RELOADED.  I recommend backing up your original files before patching, to make it easier to install future patches.

You're welcome! ;) 
 - moeburn


=====NFO======


  1. Unrar into your <install> directory, overwriting existing files.
  2. Play the game.
  3. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
